application.name: Tomos
application.desc:
Tomos is an unofficial client for the Polish Librus Synergia platform, created to bring clarity to grades, messages, attendance and school information. Inspired by the student-focused project librusek, Tomos extends its functionality to parents as well, offering a clear and accessible view into the daily school environment. It is built on top of the Synergic library and developed using Flutter.

Tomos is not affiliated with the Librus company. It is a work in progress and may contain bugs, but continues to evolve with each release.

Features:

  • Unified Synergic Feed: Recent grades, messages, absences and teacher substitutions in one place.
  • Attendance Overview: Detailed attendance records with percentage calculations for each subject.
  • Grades: A clear and structured view of academic results.
  • School Trips: Information about upcoming school trips and excursions.
  • Messaging: Fetching message snippets and full message details from the Synergic API.
  • User Management: Support for multiple accounts, each with a custom avatar.
  • Auto‑Login: Quick access without re-entering credentials.
  • Cross‑Platform Foundation: Built with Flutter; tested on Android and Windows. Web version possible with proper CORS configuration.
  • State Management: Powered by Riverpod for predictable and stable behavior.

Tomos is developed as a single‑author project and combines both experimental and enterprise‑grade architectural elements. The UI is actively evolving and may vary between screens as part of ongoing design exploration.
